name: In The Lost Lands
description:
Hello and thank you for checking out In The Lost Lands!

This is my first game ever, it's currently a Single-Player FPS Rogue-like Adventure, housing 5 dungeons with a Gem Augment in each dungeon. Collect them all for the most powerful staff in the land! 

Future plans include:

Adding more classes, more dungeons, more augments, better polished UI, model animation, real enemy attack patterns,  and so much more !
